name: SquareTube
description: Turns avatars in YouTube's new theme (2017) back into squares.
additional_info:
I threw this together in a few minutes, so if I missed something please contact me.
I'll append the style if I see anything overly round on the page or if I notice any mistakes.

Changelog:
2017-12-7: Added support for sidebar ad channel avatars.
2017-05-02: Squared the circles on 'shelves' (front page categories) and in channel page headers and channel search results.
2017-05-12: Squared author thumbnail of active comment boxes. Consolidated CSS rules into a single one with multiple selectors.
2017-08-07: The mini channel renderer (for example in the channel sidebar on channel pages) now shows square icons.
2017-08-30: Maintenance update to re-square comment avatars.
2017-08-30: Fixed channel grid on e.g. https://www.youtube.com/user/YouTube/channels.
2017-08-30: Fixed active account header renderer (in settings drop-down).
2017-08-30: Fixed notification avatars.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("youtube.com") {
  #avatar.ytd-active-account-header-renderer, /* when you click on your avatar in the top-right corner to open the settings */
  yt-img-shadow.ytd-guide-entry-renderer,
  yt-img-shadow.ytd-channel-avatar-editor,
  #avatar.ytd-video-owner-renderer,
  #author-thumbnail.ytd-comment-simplebox-renderer,
  #author-thumbnail.ytd-comment-renderer yt-img-shadow.ytd-comment-renderer, /* comment avatars */
  yt-img-shadow.ytd-topbar-menu-button-renderer,
  .ytp-ce-channel,
  .ytp-ce-channel .ytp-ce-expanding-image,
  .ytp-ce-channel .ytp-ce-element-shadow,
  #avatar.ytd-shelf-renderer,
  #avatar.ytd-c4-tabbed-header-renderer,
  yt-img-shadow.ytd-channel-renderer,
  yt-img-shadow.ytd-mini-channel-renderer,
  #author-thumbnail.ytd-commentbox,
  ytd-commentbox[is-reply] #author-thumbnail.ytd-commentbox,
  yt-img-shadow.ytd-grid-channel-renderer, /* affects e.g. https://www.youtube.com/user/YouTube/channels */
  .thumbnail.ytd-notification-renderer, /* top bar notification drop-down */
  .polymer .channel-thumb-top-v2 /* channel widgets in side advertisements */
  {
    border-radius: unset;
  }
}
